record.field.name: field.case
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: Service Manager converts character data entered on the Validity Correction Screen to upper case (uc) or lower case (lc), depending on your entry.
If this field is empty (NULL), Service Manager does not alter the data.
This field affects character fields only.

detail.detail: The validation routine assumes that the data passed to it is in the correct case and attempts to validate the data with its case setting as is. If the data does not validate, Service Manager displays a Validity Correction Screen that displays Values/Ranges for the user to select.

The corrected data entered by the user is in lower case. If the Values/Ranges for the field require upper case data, then a value of uc converts the operator-entered data to upper case before it is re-validated.
This same logic also applies to the lc setting.
